comment: Renaming new_name_timestamp index on recentchanges to rc_new_name_timestamp (T270033)

before.name: recentchanges
before.comment: Primarily a summary table for Special:Recentchanges, this table contains some additional info on edits from the last few days, see Article::editUpdates()

columns.name: rc_actor
columns.comment: As in revision

columns.name: rc_namespace
columns.comment: When pages are renamed, their RC entries do _not_ change.

columns.name: rc_comment_id
columns.comment: as in revision...

columns.name: rc_bot
columns.comment: Edits by user accounts with the 'bot' rights key are marked with a 1 here, and will be hidden from the default view.

columns.name: rc_new
columns.comment: Set if this change corresponds to a page creation

columns.name: rc_cur_id
columns.comment: Key to page_id (was cur_id prior to 1.5). This will keep links working after moves while retaining the at-the-time name in the changes list.

columns.name: rc_this_oldid
columns.comment: rev_id of the given revision

columns.name: rc_last_oldid
columns.comment: rev_id of the prior revision, for generating diff links.

columns.name: rc_type
columns.comment: The type of change entry (RC_EDIT,RC_NEW,RC_LOG,RC_EXTERNAL)

columns.name: rc_source
columns.comment: The source of the change entry (replaces rc_type) default of '' is temporary, needed for initial migration

columns.name: rc_patrolled
columns.comment: If the Recent Changes Patrol option is enabled, users may mark edits as having been reviewed to remove a warning flag on the RC list. A value of 1 indicates the page has been reviewed.

columns.name: rc_ip
columns.comment: Recorded IP address the edit was made from, if the $wgPutIPinRC option is enabled.

columns.name: rc_old_len
columns.comment: Text length in characters before the edit

columns.name: rc_new_len
columns.comment: Text length in characters after the edit

columns.name: rc_deleted
columns.comment: Visibility of recent changes items, bitfield

columns.name: rc_logid
columns.comment: Value corresponding to log_id, specific log entries

columns.name: rc_log_type
columns.comment: Store log type info here, or null

columns.name: rc_log_action
columns.comment: Store log action or null

columns.name: rc_params
columns.comment: Log params

indexes.name: rc_cur_id
indexes.comment: Special:Recentchangeslinked when finding changes in pages linked from a page

indexes.name: rc_ip
indexes.comment: Blank unless $wgPutIPinRC=true (false at WMF), possibly used by extensions, but mostly replaced by CheckUser.

indexes.name: rc_ns_actor
indexes.comment: Probably intended for Special:NewPages namespace filter

indexes.name: rc_actor
indexes.comment: SiteStats active user count, Special:ActiveUsers, Special:NewPages user filter
